gw.plugin.pas

Interface IPolicySystemPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IPolicySystemPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void confirmPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod, java.lang.String transactionId)
      Notify PAS that a payment was applied to the policyPeriod with an amount that was sufficient to confirm the policy period.
      void notifyPaymentReceivedForRenewalOffer(SuspensePayment payment, java.lang.String transactionId)
      Notify PAS about a suspense payment received for an offer number.
      void requestCancellation(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod, DelinquencyReason reason, java.lang.String transactionId)
      Call PAS to cancel a policy period (eg. because of delinquency)
      void rescindCancellation(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod, DelinquencyReason reason, java.lang.String transactionId)
      Call PAS to rescind a policy period cancellation (eg. because of payment coming in)

    • Method Detail

      • rescindCancellation

        void rescindCancellation(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                       DelinquencyReason reason,
                       java.lang.String transactionId)
        Call PAS to rescind a policy period cancellation (eg. because of payment coming in)
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period being cancelled
        reason - the delinquency reason
        transactionId - the unique id for this request. This id will be used to make this call idempotent

      • requestCancellation

        void requestCancellation(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                       DelinquencyReason reason,
                       java.lang.String transactionId)
        Call PAS to cancel a policy period (eg. because of delinquency)
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period to be cancelled
        reason - the delinquency reason
        transactionId - the unique id for this request. This id will be used to make this call idempotent

      • notifyPaymentReceivedForRenewalOffer

        void notifyPaymentReceivedForRenewalOffer(SuspensePayment payment,
                                        java.lang.String transactionId)
        Notify PAS about a suspense payment received for an offer number. If PAS throw exception because it can not honor this offer, an activity will be created.
        Parameters:
        payment - the suspense payment received
        transactionId - the unique id for this request. This id will be used to make this call idempotent

      • confirmPolicyPeriod

        void confirmPolicyPeriod(PolicyPeriod policyPeriod,
                       java.lang.String transactionId)
        Notify PAS that a payment was applied to the policyPeriod with an amount that was sufficient to confirm the policy period.
        Parameters:
        policyPeriod - the policy period that was confirmed
        transactionId - the unique id for this request. This id will be used to make this call idempotent
